item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

	if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ryan"))))
	{
		try
		{
			String otherPName = command.substring(10);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 2;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you an Admin!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
				yell("  "+ playerName + " made "+ p.playerName +" an Admin.");
				p.disconnected = false;
				p.logoutButton = false;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
		}
	}
	if (command.startsWith("givemod") && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ryan"))))
	{
		try
		{
			String otherPName = command.substring(8);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 1;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you a Mod!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " a Mod!");
				yell("  "+ playerName + " made "+ p.playerName +" an Mod.");
				p.disconnected = false;
				p.logoutButton = false;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.description:
@ryebread8888 wrote:

String name = command.substring(10);

try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

c.playerRights = 2;
c.disconnected = true;
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(name + " either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“givemod”)) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ryan”); {
String name = command.substring(8);

try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

c.playerRights = 1;
c.disconnected = true;

sM(name + " either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
